entry.title: First post
entry.content:
This is my first post! This is a blog post built with Jekyll and Markdown, hosted on Github. Letâ€™s see what we can do.

Syntax

We can make headings!

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Text can be bold, italicized, or both.

We can also make block quotes.

  1. Lists
  2. Can be
  3. Ordered
  • Lists
  • Can also be
  • Not ordered

We can upload pictures. 

We can make code blocks.

Strike through words.

  • Complete a task list
  • Finish my analyses
  • Save the world

Unfortunately we have to use html tags to natively subscript2, superscript2, and highlight.

We also have to use html to natively use ðŸ™„ .

We can make tables
very conveniently

We can use a sentence with a footnote. 1

  1. This is the footnote.Â ↩
